瓭字的基本解释

瓭
dǎn
盎、缶一类瓦器。
小罂。

瓭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǎn］
［《廣韻》都感切，上感，端。］
(1)陶制容器。
(2)小罂。
(3)瓦属。
[②]［dān］
同“甔1”。

瓭字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　瓭； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页748第16
【廣韻】【集韻】?都感切，音黕。【博雅】瓭，甁也。　又【集韻】一曰瓦屬。　又【集韻】持林切，音沈。【揚子·方言】甖，靈桂之郊謂之㼚。其小者謂之瓭。【釋文】都感反，亦音沈。　又都含切，音耽。大甖。可受一石。

瓭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
瓭字的起名意思

暂无。

瓭
Basic explanation of words
瓭
dǎn
Ang and Fou pottery.
Little poppy.
瓭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǎn］
["Guangyun" has a sense of touch, sense, and end. ]
(1) Earthenware container.
(2) Little poppy.
(3) Tile belongs to.
[②]［dān］
Same as "Nun1".
瓭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Wa Zi Department] 　瓭; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 748-16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? All feel cut, the sound is red. [Bo Ya] 瓭, 甁也.　[Jiyun] One is the genus of tile.　[Jiyun] Holding Lin Qi, the sound is deep. 【Yangtze Dialect】Poppy, the suburb of Linggui is called Zhimei. The smaller one is called Zhijun. [Explanation] All feel repulsive, and the sound is deep.　They all contain cutting, and the sound is delayed. Big poppy. Can be affected by one stone.
